latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Reinspection Not Required

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service failed to conduct and document monthly fire drills
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: Adequate plumbing not provided or maintained at time of inspection

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service allows staff to perform their duties that are not healthy or are incapable of carrying out their duties Staff medical clearances are not maintained by child care service
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to conduct business and employment reference checks of staff/volunteers
Child care service failed to provide or maintain record of staff immunizations
At time of inspection it was determined that child care service failed to ensure staff received required training within time frames and/or failed to maintain training records
All teachers have not received training in infectious disease control and reporting
Adequate space/arrangement to provide separate storage areas for childrens outer garments not provided or maintained at time of inspection
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection floors/walls ceilings were observed not maintained in disrepair or covered in a toxic finish
At time of inspection it was determined/observed that food service worker not provided with appropriate food thermometer during food prep
